entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
